trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
The parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> object.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> with the provided data source designer.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports deletes.
<see langword="true" /> if deletes are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se le eliminazioni sono supportate. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports inserts.
<see langword="true" /> if inserts are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se gli inserimenti sono supportati. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports paging through data returned by a query.
<see langword="true" /> if paging is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il paging è supportato. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
<see langword="true" /> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se l'ordinamento è supportato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports updates.
<see langword="true" /> if updates are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se gli aggiornamenti sono supportati. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
The data to display at design time.
Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se i dati sono dati di esempio o reali.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
An object that represents the schema.
